hypothesis_content.title: Liquidity Gap Reversal After News-Driven Panic
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC experiences a >5% intraday drop on US budget crisis headlines but funding rates remain neutral/positive, price will mean-revert within 48 hours as liquidity returns to fill the gap.
hypothesis_content.rationale: October's 'liquidity crash' created structural gaps that get filled when panic is news-driven rather than fundamental. Neutral funding suggests no systematic deleveraging.
entry_conditions: BTC 1H close down >5% from previous day's close
BTC perpetual funding rate > -0.001% (not excessively negative)
Cumulative volume delta (CVD) shows net selling but with declining intensity
News sentiment score < 0.3 (extreme negative) on budget/deficit headlines

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces 70% of the initial drop
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price makes new low below entry candle by 2%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Price continues dropping >8% below entry with funding turning deeply negative (< -0.01%)
